entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
